promptVersions.body:
Effective 9/29/2021 the Create SRN button has been added back to SPIRE and the Create Auth button has been

removed from the View Authorization topic. Using the Create SRN Button when needing to create a new 

authorization will use Single Sign On to log you into ICUE as well as navigate you to the Initiate HSC Intake screen

and carry over and caller/member details captured in SPIRE. This will allow you to continue to service these call types

in SPIRE until the Create Authorization function can be reintegrated at a later time after additional functionalities are 

added and outstanding issues/errors are resolved. Thank you.
promptVersions.description: US3864086: Reimplement the Create SRN Button and Hide Create Auth Button
promptVersions.title: Create SRN button Activated for Auth
